app_title: Dota Underlords stats, guides, and tips
app_description: Open source Dota Underlords data platform
install_description: Just like Underlords, OpenUnderlords works offline. Access guides and stats wherever you are.
install_description2: It's less than 1 MB on your phone and won't drain your battery.
home_description: Stats coming soon! While we wait, learn more about the game.
page_alliances_description: View all Dota Underlords alliances, synergies, descriptions, and effects. Find the best hero combos!
page_heroes_description: View all Dota Underlords heroes, stats, descriptions, and abilities. Find the best heroes!
page_items_description: View all Dota Underlords items, stats, descriptions, and effects. Find the best items!
